description: Bugbane, or Actaea podocarpa, is an amazing plant species from North America. This incredible flower is a standout in any garden thanks to its striking foliage consisting of dark-green leaves and its white flowers that emerge in summer. The foliage turns yellow and red in fall, while the white flowers give off a sweet scent that invites butterflies and pollinators to the garden. Not only is it beautiful, but it is also long-spoken to repel unwanted pests which help to make it an asset to any garden. With its captivating appearance and fragrant flower, bugbane is an amazing species to look out for!
